titleStmt.title: A few words by way of query to the teachers, and professors, called Presbyterians and Independents with a word of prophesie, in verse : also a word of exhortation and warning of love to them to haste out of Babylon, the mystery of iniquity, into Sion, the City of Holinesse : with a word at last to those that were persecutors / written by ... John Whithowse.
titleStmt.author: Whitehouse, John, fl. 1662-1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
